description:
## Control Dashboard Pro - Monitor and control dashboard

![Screenshot of Control Dashboard Pro](https://www.japplis.com/control-dashboard/pro/images/control-dashboard-pro-screenshot.png)

Advanced monitoring of resources such as files and websites dashboard. 
* Leave the window always on top and translucent. 
* Run it embedded in your IDE like IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio or Eclipse. 
* Import and export controls
* Show execution history
* Group controls with fail group if one fails or if all fail
* Beep or show application when control fails
* Advanced scheduling of monitoring
* File exsits or not
* File modified
* File execution and check output
* HTTP Get support
* HTTP Post support
* Support of HTTP headers and cookies
        
Shareware: Fully functional for one day, then limited features.
author: Japplis
